Antonio's
Cats Home

Adopt a kitty

We aim to never turn away a cat in need of help, caring for them until their owners or loving new homes can be found, no matter how long it takes. We are champions for, and supporters of, vulnerable cats, determined to create lasting changes for animals in our society. Every year, we care for over 8,000 cats.

Loading...

If you are opening dist/index.htm directly from a file explorer it will only work on Firefox (it supports the file:/// standard with CORS). You can launch a local server executing npm start.

If you are opening src/index.htm you will see a totally erroneous page. Open dist/index.htm or create a local server with npm start.

Please check the README file for further information. JS, HTML and CSS code is not minimised. To see a minimised build execute gulp min.
